verses.name: Numbers 15:39
verses.text: And it shall be unto you for a fringe, that ye may look upon it, and remember all the commandments of the Lord, and do them; and that ye seek not after your own heart and your own eyes, after which ye use to go a whoring:

verses.name: Numbers 15:40
verses.text: That ye may remember, and do all my commandments, and be holy unto your God.

verses.name: Numbers 15:41
verses.text: I am the Lord your God, which brought you out of the land of Egypt, to be your God: I am the Lord your God.
